div.a: Tell City-Troy Township Continuous Learning Plan

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-6 col-md-4 col-lg-4 home-right home-right-top

div.span: Welcome to Tell City - Troy Township Schools

div.div:
Welcome to the Tell City-Troy Township School Corporation. I am proud to be a part of such an outstanding organization that believes in the abilities of all children. Our beliefs and mission shine through our A-Rated Schools. We believe that all children can learn in the appropriate environment and our staff goes the extra mile to ensure their success.
If you are interested in outstanding educational experiences for your children with proven techniques for success, we invite you to join our schools and community.
With pride, we are the Tell City MARKSMEN!
